headline: AMC Networks: The Multi-Year Bear Case Remains Intact
summary: AMC Networks stock looks cheap, but legacy declines, rising leverage, and weak FCF raise risk. Here's why investors should steer clear.

raw.headline: AMC Networks: The Multi-Year Bear Case Remains Intact
raw.summary: AMC Networks stock looks cheap, but legacy declines, rising leverage, and weak FCF raise risk. Here's why investors should steer clear.

headline: Comcast spinoff Versant starts trading on Nasdaq in rare media debut
summary: Versant, Comcast's spinoff of the majority of NBCUniversal's cable TV networks like MS Now and CNBC, started trading Monday.

raw.headline: Comcast spinoff Versant starts trading on Nasdaq in rare media debut
